price: 99. Nabiyow Nummah Baxxaqqa itta Aayootay ku-Nubuwwannu tascassee kol oobisne, tet yangaddeeh teetil koroosita mari mayan, Yallih Amri cineeh kay taaqatak yewqe mara Akke waytek.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilayka āyātin bayyinātin wamā yakfuru bihā illā al-fāsiqūna
